description: The master of Nonohara Kaede and a member of the kendo club. He is considered the weakest member of the club because his strikes are random and dangerous. He has a vulgar mouth, but it is Kaede`s duty to refine him into a gentleman. When he is in trouble, he calls for Kaede to fight for him. Out of jealousy, he challenges Hayate to a duel when he sees him being friendly with Hinagiku. He is often beaten up mercilessly by Kaede for his weaknesses.
name: Azumamiya Koutarou
